Articles.Content: So is there a way to take the science utilities (Goo and Science Kit) and turn them from 'single shot dead weight' to 'multi-shot useful item?' I can't seem to find the single-shot line.

You can do that with modulemanager, something like this:


@PART[*]:HAS[@MODULE[ModuleScienceExperiment]]:Final
{
	@MODULE[ModuleScienceExperiment],*
	{
		%rerunnable = True
	}
}
